institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 1 (Purpose)
contents: Article 1 (Purpose) These rules are in accordance with the Enforcement Decree of the Employment Insurance Act, the Implementation Regulations for Vocational Competency Development Support Projects for Small and Medium Enterprises enacted and announced by the Ministry of Employment and Labor (hereinafter referred to as *Vocational Competency Development Regulations), and the Operation Regulations for the Certification System for Excellent Human Resources Development Institutions (hereinafter referred to as the “Vocational Competency Development Regulations”) The purpose is to stipulate matters delegated to the Human Resources Development Service of Korea (hereinafter referred to as *Certification System Regulations) and matters necessary for its implementation.
